bug.author: benjaminp
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>$ python3 spacy/lang/hi/examples.py File "spacy/lang/hi/examples.py", line 15 "‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à", ^ SyntaxError: invalid character in identifier </denchmark-code>
This is because the whitespace contains U+00A0 (NO-BREAK SPACE) which Python does not understand.

comments.comment: Thanks for spotting this! üëç If you have a second, do you want to submit a quick PR?

I still get this error during installation: <denchmark-code>File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/spacy/lang/hi/examples.py", line 15 ¬†¬†¬†¬† "‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ì‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ ‡§¶‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§µ ‡§∞‡§ñ‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à", ^ SyntaxError: invalid syntax
</denchmark-code>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
